text: @NorbertElekes @gtconway3d @realDonaldTrump & the @WhiteHouse were still holding rallies in March endangering Americans, after being briefed on #COVID19 the possible spread & potential serious medical implications & possible death in January. Trump a wartime president lol, that's the biggest joke around.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
